attributes.action: recognise the unique contribution of john barry by knighting him
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Barry is not just one of the greatest composers of screen music he is amongst the greatest composers that this country has ever produced. It is high time that he was recognised by bestowing a knighthood on him as soon as possible.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
